title: Voxiversity: Thucydides S8
author: VD
content_html:
The quiz covering the events of Book Seven, which took place during the eighteenth and nineteenth years of the war can be taken here.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 1.1 to 1.115.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 1.116 to 2.46.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 2.47 to 2.103.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 3.1 to 3.116.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 4.1 to 4.135.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 5.1 to 5.116.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 6.1 to 6.105

This is where it all comes to a climax; it’s fascinating to see the way in which Athenian strengths and weaknesses are all brought into highlight by the stresses of war.
